name: The Palace on the Hill
description:
Live in a cosy hillside village and experience the life of Vir, a poor farmer’s son, who dreams of studying art.
Featuring a classic management-adventure gameplay, explore ancient ruins, manage a tea shop, set up a farm, solve relaxing puzzles to make art, and interact with a quirky cast of characters.

NOTE: This is a free demo of the upcoming game.

Features
  • An emotional story of personal achievement.
  • Vibrant hand-painted watercolour graphics.
  • Indian Cooking
  • A unique relaxing puzzle based painting mechanic.
  • Historical Indian royal palace exploration.
